name: D. Fibonacci Sums
statement:
Fibonacci numbers have the following form: Let’s consider some non-empty
set , consisting of Fibonacci numbers. Let’s find the sum of values of
this set’s elements:Let’s call the set a number ’s . It’s easy to see
that several numbers have several decompositions into Fibonacci sum. For
example, for we have three decompositions, and for : four
decompositions.By the given number determine the number of its possible
different decompositions into Fibonacci sum.
